Package com.guardtime.container.verification.policy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    VerificationPolicy
    Access interface for providing Rules to be used for verifying a Container Contains rules to be performed on container to prove validity.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultVerificationPolicy
    Default implementation of VerificationPolicy Contains rules for: verifying MIME type verifying signature verifying DocumentsManifest verifying ContainerDocuments verifying AnnotationsManifest verifying SingleAnnotationManifests verifying ContainerAnnotations May contain extra rules to add specialized verification requirements to the policy or to overwrite some of the pre-existing rules.
    InternalVerificationPolicy
